Polymarket Analytics by Hashdive






Hashdive is a powerful Polymarket Analytics platform.
    
Polymarket Analytics
Polymarket: Market Overview
Analyze the top trading markets on Polymarket, track liquidity, volume, and AI-powered probabilities.
Key Market Statistics

Top 20 Markets: Ordered by liquidity and trading volume.
AI Probability: Compare human vs AI-calculated probabilities.
Market Trends: Interactive charts and insights.
Smart Score: Evaluate user performance based on historical trading success.

User Trading Performance
Enter a Polygon address to analyze user positions, profit/loss details, and trading scores.
Analyze User
Top Market Trends

Check out the latest market trends and price movements. Data-driven insights available for all top markets.

Market Analysis Charts

Market Data (Yes vs No): A comparison of market sentiment and price action.
Value per Entry Price: A visualization of positions by entry price.
Profit and Loss Distribution: Analysis of the top traders' positions.
Smart Score Distribution: Breakdown of traders' performance based on past market activities.

Explore the Markets
